mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_mail (email_id, email_title, email_content, sent_date, sender_emp_id, attachment) VALUES (#{emailId}, #{emailTitle}, #{emailContent}, CURDATE() , #{senderEmpId}, #{attachment})
INSERT INTO tbl_mail_receivers (email_id, receiver_emp_id, read_status ,trash_status ) VALUES (#{emailId}, #{receiverEmpId}, #{readStatus} , 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_mail m INNER JOIN tbl_mail_receivers mr on m.email_id = mr.email_id WHERE m.sender_emp_id = #{senderEmpId} AND mr.trash_status = 0
SELECT * FROM tbl_mail m INNER JOIN tbl_mail_receivers mr on m.email_id = mr.email_id WHERE mr.receiver_emp_id = #{receiverEmpId} AND mr.trash_status = 0
SELECT m.*, mr.receiver_emp_id FROM tbl_mail m INNER JOIN tbl_mail_receivers mr ON m.email_id = mr.email_id WHERE mr.trash_status = 1
SELECT m.*, mr.receiver_emp_id FROM tbl_mail m INNER JOIN tbl_mail_receivers mr ON m.email_id = mr.email_id WHERE mr.trash_status = 1

SELECT m.email_id AS emailId, m.email_title AS emailTitle, m.sent_date AS sentDate, m.attachment, e.emp_name AS positionName, d.dept_name AS deptName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_mail_receivers mr WHERE mr.email_id = m.email_id) AS receiverCount FROM tbl_mail m JOIN employee e ON m.sender_emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN tbl_department d ON e.dept_code = d.dept_code WHERE m.sender_emp_id = #{empId} ORDER BY m.sent_date DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
